author: rahul
msg: Add a test case for multiple transition targets (fails on v0.6, passes on trunk). Choose targets that are not respective initials in their region.

author: rahul
msg: - Remove usage of deprecated methods in Transition
- Leverage easier parent-child associations from r517349
- Verify (at parse time) that multiple targets, where specified, satisfy spec-mandated conditions
- Change LCA to return the Parallel, instead of the orthogonal state
